mapper.sql: codeMetaSeq, codeMetaId, codeMetaName, codeMetaTblName, codeMetaSrcFld, codeMetaSrcItem, codeMetaValueFld, codeMetaValueFldName, codeMetaShowFld, codeMetaShowFldName, codeMetaSortFld, codeMetaSortFldName, codeMetaType, showOrNot, codeMetaSort
mapper.update: update BaphiqCodeMetaDef set codeMetaId = #{codemetaid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaName = #{codemetaname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaTblName = #{codemetatblname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaSrcFld = #{codemetasrcfld,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaSrcItem = #{codemetasrcitem,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaValueFld = #{codemetavaluefld,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaValueFldName = #{codemetavaluefldname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaShowFld = #{codemetashowfld,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaShowFldName = #{codemetashowfldname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaSortFld = #{codemetasortfld,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaSortFldName = #{codemetasortfldname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, codeMetaType = #{codemetatype,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, showOrNot = #{showornot,jdbcType=CHAR}, codeMetaSort = #{codemetasort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where codeMetaSeq = #{codemetaseq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from BaphiqCodeMetaDef order by codeMetaSort
select row_number() over ( order by codemetasort) as rowid, codemetatype, codemetasort from Baphiqcodemetadef group by codemetatype, codemetasort
select codemetatblname from Baphiqcodemetadef where codemetaid = #{codemetaid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

select * from ( select row_number() over (order by codeMetaSort) as row_num,
from BaphiqCodeMetaDef ) as tb where row_num between ((#{page} - 1) * #{showNum} + 1) and (#{page}*#{showNum})
